CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 28, 1963, pg. 12 reads: "The speakers' table is mute evidence of the glorious occasion which took place at Iron City Lodge Hall, recently, which was given as a tribute to Louis McTurner, Chief Antler of Steel City Council 1, and Mrs. Marie Jordan, Loyal Dt. Ruler of Alpha Council, IBPOEW. Special guests at the table, left to right: William Howell, Robert Jones, Herman Peterson, GDD, Mary N. Smith, Dt. Ruler; Mrs. Jordan and Mr. McTurner, honorees; Joseph Givens, legal advisor; Oscar Price, P.G.E. Ruler; Clara Randolph, D.D.; Ely Randolph, P.G.E. Ruler and Ella Smith, D.D. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: William Howell, Robert Jones, Herman Peterson, Mary N. Smith, Marie Jordan and Louis McTurner, honorees; Joseph Givens, Oscar Price, Clara Randolph, Ely Randolph, and Ella Smith, seated around table in Iron City Lodge Hall for tribute banquet, another version
